content.description:
A SKETCH BY JAN BRANDES, DUTCH LUTHERAN MINISTER LIVING IN JAKARTA, INDONESIA, 1784

Rijksmuseum, Amsterdam, The Netherlands / Bridgeman Images

The sketch shows the artist’s son Johnny and Flora, an enslaved Indonesian household servant.
content.question: Which of the following developments facilitated the family situation portrayed in Brandes’ sketch?

choices.label: The recruitment of new bureaucratic elites by Muslim states in Southeast Asia
The expansion of European colonial empires in Southeast Asia
The changes in family demographic structure resulting from the trans-Atlantic slave trade
The creation of new gender hierarchies in emerging maritime empires

content.answer: The expansion of European colonial empires in Southeast Asia
